summary: Removes some (not all) of the insect audio loops. For those who hate that hissing sound in your ears.
descriptionHtml:
Removes some (not all) of the insect audio \"LOOPS\". For those who hate that hissing sound in your ears. Gave me a headache when using headphones. 

This I feel gives a much more pleasant audio experience. The removal of these loops brings other sound to the front. Now you can hear the owls and birds (for example) without the insect hiss drowning everything out.

Will this remove all insect/cricket sounds ?

No this only effects the ambient loops that seem to follow you wherever you go. You will still get the odd individual instance of cricket or insects. But now when you walk away the sound wont follow you.


Installation :

Unzip

Find \"Sound\" folder and copy it to your skyrim\\data folder

Conflicts :

Some other audio mods might make similar changes to these sounds, and as such will conflict.

To Do List :

Do the same for night time sounds as well - DONE
Make Mod work with Mod Manager
author: notwenjc
